metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6101 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A lack of host validation in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to66.0.3359.117 allowed a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via acrafted HTML page, if the user is running a remote DevTools debuggingserver.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
